title: lovely
author: Billie Eilish, Khalid
lyrics:
[00:21.23] Thought I found a way
[00:24.73] Thought I found a way out (found)
[00:28.18] But you never go away (never go away)
[00:33.25] So I guess I gotta stay now
[00:35.89] Oh, I hope some day I'll make it out of here
[00:44.54] Even if it takes all night or a hundred years
[00:53.19] Need a place to hide, but I can't find one near
[01:01.47] Wanna feel alive, outside I can't fight my fear
[01:11.38] Isn't it lovely? All alone
[01:14.98] Heart made of glass, my mind of stone
[01:19.10] Tear me to pieces, skin to bone
[01:23.83] Hello, welcome home
[01:29.54] 
[01:32.27] Walking out of town
[01:36.26] Looking for a better place (looking for a better place)
[01:40.46] Something's on my mind
[01:44.31] Always in my head space
[01:47.04] But I know someday I'll make it out of here
[01:55.72] Even if it takes all night or a hundred years
[02:04.27] Need a place to hide, but I can't find one near
[02:12.31] Wanna feel alive, outside I can't fight my fear
[02:21.85] Isn't it lovely? All alone
[02:25.88] Heart made of glass, my mind of stone
[02:30.13] Tear me to pieces, skin to bone
[02:34.99] Hello, welcome home
[02:41.05] Woah, yeah
[02:47.66] Yeah, ah
[02:53.71] Woah, woah
[02:57.31] 
[03:08.58] Hello, welcome home
[03:12.27]
